full_summary:
**Stage 1 – Spruce River Bridge and Culvert Repairs – Prince Albert National Park**
**Titre : Appel d’offres – Phase 1 – Réparation du pont de la rivière Spruce et d’un ponceau Parc national de Prince Albert**

**Reference Number**
cb-900-62954039

**Solicitation Number**
5P468-23-0090

**Publication Date**
02 January 2024

**Tender Closing Date**
30 January 2024, 16:00:00

**Expected Contract Start Date**
12 February 2024

**Expected Contract End Date**
15 November 2024

**Notice Type**
Invitation to Qualify

**Procurement Category**
CNST

**Procurement Method**
Competitive – Open Bidding

**Selection Criteria**
Lowest Price

**Limited Tendering Reason**
None

**Trade Agreements**
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Region of Opportunity**
Canada

**Region of Delivery**
Saskatchewan, Canada

**Contracting Entity Name**
Parks Canada

**Contact Person**
Jen Maheu
(587) 432-8458
info@pc.gc.ca

**Tender Description (English)**
This tender solicitation cancels and supersedes previous tender solicitation number 5P468-23-0090/A dated June 28, 2023 with a closing of July 13, 2023 at 2:00 PM MDT. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders who bid on the previous solicitation.

Bids received by fax and email will be accepted as official.

Parks Canada requires renovations to the Spruce River Bridge, including the replacement of the existing timber bracing on the in-water pier, supply and installation of new timber members at the abutments and in-water pier, and localized roadway patch repair.

The contract value is estimated between $100,001 and $250,000 (Taxes extra). Late submissions will not be considered.

A bidder's conference will be held on January 9, 2024 at 11:00 AM CST. All interested suppliers are encouraged to participate, especially regarding the technical and contractual aspects of this tender.

**Tender Description (French)**
Cette demande de soumissions annule et remplace l’ancienne demande de soumission numéro 5P468-23-0090/A datée du 28 juin 2023
